title: Leaders of the Progressive movement - who

content.question: The leaders of the Progressive movement were primarily

choices.label: farmers interested in improving agricultural production
immigrant activities attempting to change restrictive immigration laws
representatives of industries seeking higher tariffs
workers concerned with establishing industrial unions
middle-class reformers concerned with urban and consumer issues

content.answer: middle-class reformers concerned with urban and consumer issues

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
